text: Savaran () may refer to: == Geography == *Savaran, Isfahan *Savaran, South Khorasan *Kani Savaran, Kurdistan Province *Pir Savaran, Hamadan Province *Kuh-e Haft Savaran, Ostan-e Lorestan, 33.57 N, 49.96 E *Ziaratgah-e Shah Savaran, Sistan and Baluchestan Province, 30.06 N, 60.77 E *Shahsavaran *Kuh-e Shahsavaran 28.76 N 60.86 E == Military == * Asvārān, also known as "Savārān", historical Persian military units. ==See also== *Shahsavar (disambiguation) *Saravan (disambiguation)
title: Savaran
